title: the last patch
body:
hey, i wanted to ask you if you know what i can do with this new update thing, it doesnt let me retry the update, like the other players but i do not have any  "ok" option. i have played today already so its not the mini patch from last night. can you help me oiut maybe?

 thanks a lot, mishanun

replies.body:
Are you still having this issue? We were aware of an issue that was preventing some players from patching, but it has seen been resolved.

Please let me know, thanks!

Hello.
Could you please give some more information?
